mapper.select: /* 포인트 적립 코드 자동생성 */ SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(1) = 0 THEN CONCAT('point_save_use', '_001') ELSE CONCAT('point-save-use-', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(point_save_use_code, 'point-save-use-', -1)AS UNSIGNED))+1, 3, 0)) END AS newCode FROM point_save_use;
mapper.insert: /* 포인트 적립/사용 등록 */ INSERT INTO point_save_use ( point_save_use_code, point_save_use_id, save_use, point_save_use_reason, point_save_use_point, total_point, save_use_datetime )VALUES( #{pointSaveUseCode},#{pointSaveUseId}, #{saveUse}, #{pointSaveUseReason}, #{pointSaveUsePoint}, #{totalPoint}, NOW() );
